caption.title: Baseline scenario with no interventions.
caption.p:
( a) number of HIV—(green) and HIV+ (red) individuals in the population; ( b) average b
t -value for HIV—individuals by age, 15-20-year-olds (red), 20–30 (orange), 30–40 (yellow), 40–50 (green), and 50+ year-olds (blue); ( c) average b
t -values for HIV+ individuals by same age groups; ( d) number of HIV+ individuals by the same age groups, and with black representing the total number of HIV+ individuals; ( e) total average b
t -value for HIV+ (red) and HIV—(green) populations; ( f) HIV prevalence (percentage of the population currently infected).
